problem_text_cn: 量角器的直径与直角三角板ABC的斜边AB重合,其中量角器O刻度线的端点N与点A重合,射线CP从CA处出发沿顺时针方向以每秒3度的速度旋转,CP与量角器的半圆弧交于点E,当第20秒时,点E在量角器上对应的读数是()
problem_text_en: The diameter of the protractor coincides with the hypotenuse AB of the right triangle ABC, where the endpoint N of the scale line of the protractor O coincides with point A, the radial CP starts from CA and rotates clockwise at a speed of N_0 degrees per second, and CP and the semicircular arc of the protractor intersect at point E, when the N_1 second, the corresponding reading of point E on the protractor is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OE,∵射线CP从CA处出发沿顺时针方向以每秒3度的速度旋转,∴第20秒时,∠ACE=3°×20=60°,∵∠ACB=90°,∴点C在以AB为直径的圆上,即点C在⊙O上,∴∠EOA=2∠ECA=2×60°=120°．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理．此题难度适中,解题的关键是证得点C在⊙O上,注意辅助线的作法,注意数形结合思想的应用．
